page.title: 03Sports in Winterbourne
page.content: Many people play sports in Winterbourne. Both football and cricket are played and there is also a tennis club. Recently there was a cricket match between Winterbourne and Gloucestershire county side to celebrate the seventy fifth year of the Winterbourne cricket club. Gloucestershire won the match but it was very close. It is not often that people in Winterbourne see professional cricketers as Winterbourne is only an amateur side. Many people play on the tennis courts especially in the evenings. The football club is very good they have a match every Saturday and Sunday and many people watch the games. Sometimes the club organizes a fancy dress match and the spectators laugh and make jokes about the players.
